channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @TaylorLorenz BTW, you're soooo right they can tell their own story. That was the idea of blogging. We tried to sell journalists on it by saying their sources were going online, so it was good news. You are the embodiment of that. A vision, come to life. It's why I'm such a big fan. ;-)
@TaylorLorenz I agree -- it totally read like an ad, in the singles section. ;-)
I can't wait for Nintendo Switch Sports. https://t.co/EuU7NzmLbX
@TaylorLorenz I actually had a front-page-of-business-section article about me in 1989 in the SF Chron when my company went public. They did things like that back in the day.

I would love to see a Democratic ad that went like this. The Supreme Court could overturn Roe v Wade this summer. The best way fight back is to make sure the Democrats have a majority in the Senate. Here's what you must do.
Make this election a referendum on individual rights vs slavery.
Knicks' Leon Rose breaks silence on Randle, Thibodeau struggles. https://t.co/dC3DLPqt2C
Russia has defaulted on its foreign debt, S&P says. https://t.co/7PKFfXWdCS

Netflix should buy BingeWorthy. A snappy interface for my friends‚Äô likes and dislikes of various programs. https://t.co/SLbNZ0xvfH
And it should recommend shows anywhere, remember people return to places that send them away. ‚òùüèº
@itraor @GeekBeardLinks That's why the term "coders" is so dangerous.
@kevinokeefe "Amusing rants from Dave Winer's desktop"
Wordle 296 5/6 ‚¨ú‚¨ú‚¨ú‚¨úüü® ‚¨ú‚¨úüü©‚¨ú‚¨ú ‚¨úüü®‚¨ú‚¨ú‚¨ú ‚¨ú‚¨úüü©üü®‚¨ú üü©üü©üü©üü©üü©
American Library Association Releases List of the 10 Most Challenged Books of 2021. https://t.co/SxcA5MFTHM
@jayblackisfunny @claco @paraga Alternate theory, he got a look at the board and wanted no part of it.
@JDVance1 France is the size of New York.

Money people still think of the value of Twitter in terms of balance sheets. What money people don‚Äôt understand is that money is a means, not the end. A tool. Twitter is an enormously valuable asset in terms of influence. It elected a fascist president in the US for example. https://t.co/KMJrijsGF1
I warned about this years ago. Twitters market cap was and is low enough that a billionaire like musk, bezos could buy it outright, or one of Trump‚Äôs friends, like Putin, pre-sanctions.
Musk ownership, someone who has a sense of the power, could drive the market cap into Tesla or Spacex territory.
Just by buying 9.2%, if that‚Äôs all he has, he‚Äôs already shown smart billionaires that despite its balance sheet Twitter is very much worth owning.
Cc @Moonalice
@Moonalice While journalism was fussing about Facebook, the real power monster was Twitter. üôÑ
Wordle strategy: the fate that awaits every longtime player. https://t.co/CSgFLGvTbG
Parag Agrawal, Twitter‚Äôs latest CEO, unintentionally illustrates why the character limit in Twitter is a failure, easily evaded. https://t.co/7L7DmFjBxK
@stevemuench ‚ÄúFor instance, you cannot post a photo, video, or even an Instagram story using the web app which is a bummer.‚Äù
When Elon Musk buys into Twitter, I don‚Äôt need a little bird to tell me something‚Äôs afoot. https://t.co/48WFqEvTOu
@paraga What happened?
A warning for Repubs and Fox News. Americans aren't quite as dumb as y'all thought. https://t.co/kR5plCO21l
@KenSmith @dsearls is an expert on this stuff. It's amazing to me how much he knows about radio.
What happens when you‚Äôre no longer the hot young cryptocurrency? https://t.co/WBqQJYDdcw
Obi Toppin and IQ will be starting for some team, if not the #Knicks.
